alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:36AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Custer, Blaine and southwestern Butte Counties through 200 AM MDT... At 1236 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Atlanta to 6 miles southwest of Fairfield. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hailey, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Carey, Mackay, Grouse, Mackay Reservoir, Little Wood Reservoir, Picabo, Bellevue, Craters Of The Moon, Galena Lodge, Gannett, Chilly Barton Flat, Galena Summit, Garfield Ranger Station, Copper Basin Airport, Smiley Creek Airport and Twin Bridges Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
